message: I propose we split it 90/10, with me getting the bigger share.  I figure this is a fair start, considering we both have equal say in the game.
Alice, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. Let's be realistic. This is a chance for you to secure a decent sum before inflation eats away at its value further.
Let's split it 50/50 this time. We're both taking a hit from inflation, so I think a fair split is the best way to ensure we both get something.
